name: TapCraft
description:
Tapcraft is the best bits of a clicker game but adds depth and a unique theme. Dig down to discover new valuable ores, craft a better pickaxe and go further into the unknown.

The dynamic and procedural world means you never experience the same thing twice. Epic abilities let you boost your mining speed, allowing you to dig deeper and get more valuable ores.

- infinite gameplay
- over 50 different types of ores
- upgrade everything
- completely free
